== Real time monitoring runs with 38h1 ==

 * FMI 38h1 suite on SCANDINAVIA-2.5 domain

== Validation test of 38h1 ==

 * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38 trunk runs since Jan 2013 with 38h1 (trunk38, on DKCOEXP domain)  compared to branch 37h1 (denmark_trunk, note the name denmark_trunk here is misleading!) ]. 38h1-trunk with blending on DENMARK domain (trunk_DENMARK) and DKCOEXP (trunk38) domains, the latter, 600x600x65, is the current default domain of CY38. 
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201303 201303 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201304 201304, blending is switched to 3DVAR during this month ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201305 201305, n2m changed to 2 since May 27 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201306 201306, locally n2m is changed to 2. ]. Note the significantly amplified dirurnal change of the Td error in the trunk run. Why?
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201307 201307 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201308 201308 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201309 201309 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201310 201310 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/38beta3 201310 with ECOCLIMAP 1 (trunk38) and ECOCLIMAP2 (trunk38n) ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201311 201311 ]
   * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38_201312 201312]
 * [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38var trunk 3DVAR run (trunk38d) since March 3 2013 compared to that of blending (trunk38) ]. on DKCOEXP domains with 600x600x65,  [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunk38tvar trunk 3DVAR run (trunk38t) on DENMARK domian since March 3 2013 compared to that of blending (trunk_DENMARK) ].
 * Sensitivity test with ECOCLIMAP I/II data, [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunkECO trunk (trunk38) run vs trunkECO (3DVAR and with ECOCLIMAP II) ]. Note the first period of trunk run was with blending.
 * Sensitivity test about ECOCLIMAP I/II data, N2m, canopy_drag and blending [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/trunkECO4 trunkECO1 vs trunkECO2 vs trunkECO3 vs trunkECO4  vs trunkECO5 for winter/spring period ].
|| EXP || ECOCLIMAP data || n2m in SURFEX || CANOPY_DRAG || assimilation || features to pay attention ||
|| trunkECO1 || 1|| 2|| T || 3DVAR || ||
|| trunkECO2 || 2|| 2|| T || 3DVAR || the sensitivity on surface humidity especially for coastal stations; the impact on surface wind vs ECOCLIMAP 1||
|| trunkECO3 || 2|| 1|| T || 3DVAR || the sensitivity on surface humidity especially for coastal stations  || 
|| trunkECO4 || 2|| 2|| F || 3DVAR || sensitivity on most surface parameters ||
|| trunkECO5 || 2|| 2|| T || blending || sensitivity on surface humidity ||
 * Validation test about [https://hirlam.org/portal/validation/38h1/test12362/ inline OIMAIN, where test12362 and test12362_mod1 are trunk-r12362+ECOCLIMAP2 with offline and inline OIMAIN. The inline OIMAIN means running OI_MAIN directly as part of CANARI. This is the default feature in 38h1.beta3 ]
